Description:
Detects the use of the spoolss named pipe over SMB. This can be used to trigger the authentication via NTLM of any machine that has the spoolservice enabled.

Author: OTR (Open Threat Research)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: DCERPC SMB Spoolss Named Pipe
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '5145' and sharename = '\\\\\*\\ipc$' and relativetargetname = 'spoolss'
